backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the LA Street Shine backend, defining booking management (submit, retrieve, update status, delete), user profiles, service info, and contact info with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Hero.tsx CTA button smooth-scroll feature (targeting id='booking') is implemented, referencing the relevant files and test ID REQ-32.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including colors for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with full SEO meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, Google Fonts (Montserrat + Rajdhani), and the root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component using TanStack Router with two routes: the home page (/) composing all section components, and the admin page (/admin).
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About Us section component displaying the founders' story narrative and four value cards (Precision, Passion, Family-Founded, Customer First) with brand-colored icons.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterGalle: Empty file â€” the BeforeAfterGallery component has no content and is not rendered in the current app.
frontend/src/components/ContactBooking.t: Contact and booking form section with id='booking' on the root element for smooth-scroll targeting, including field validation, service selection, and error/success states via the useSubmitBooking hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social media links (Instagram, TikTok), quick navigation links with smooth scroll, and contact details including phone and location.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background car image, headline, subheadline, CTA buttons to book or call, and a stats row highlighting mobile service, 5-star rating, and LA County coverage.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a call CTA button, scroll-based background change, and a responsive hamburger menu for mobile.
Displays a grid of seven auto detailing service cards with icons, starting prices, and descriptions, highlighting the Full Detail Package as the most popular option.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Shows three customer review cards with star ratings, quotes, and service labels, plus a social proof bar at the bottom of the section.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Presents five reason cards explaining the company's value proposition (mobile service, premium products, affordability, reliability, satisfaction) along with a referral and loyalty rewards section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including submitting/fetching/updating/deleting bookings and getting/updating service info.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining the LA Street Shine brand design system with OKLCH color tokens, gradient utilities, glass-card effects, and glow styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with password-gated access that allows viewing/managing bookings and updating service info via tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom brand colors (black, blue, pink), fonts (Montserrat, Rajdhani), shadows, animations, and integrating typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracker (version 23) documenting the LA Street Shine Auto Detailing website build, including architectural notes, known issues (booking form text visibility), and a list of existing implemented features.
